title: Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Capacity-building program for educational institution administrators/leaders to design support systems for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Three or more impacts of school support systems on instructional design content creation can be explained
One or more instructional design strategies utilizing generative AI technology can be developed
Two or more support measures for enhancing pre-service teachers' self-efficacy can be proposed
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
